ISSUE.TITLE: Rename `AdminMenu.GetItemBySystem` to `AdminMenu.GetItemBySystemName`
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: 4.80.3 Seems like "name" was accidentally omitted, as the parameter and the description refer to "system name" and method is only called "system"

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #7559 Delete "cacheable copy" comment from LanguageService class (#7567)
